Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the size of the squirrel, stating it is 110 pounds when it is not.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or support to prove that a 110-pound squirrel was shot in North Texas.

Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the photograph, stating that it is a result of forced perspective and not an actual 110-pound squirrel.
